bot.name: Wargroove Damage Discord Bot
bot.desc: A Discord bot that parases and calculates user input for the game Wargroove. Used and deployed in the official Wargroove discord. Hosted on a third-party cloud service. Twitch chat integration for personal Twitch account

ai.name: Natural Language Predictor
ai.desc: Part-Of-Speech (POS) tagging training and prediction. Probability tables are created with words that are associated with a part-of-speech tag. The tables are then used to create a Hidden Markov Model for future prediction.

site.name: Personal Website
site.desc: This website right here! Next improvement for the site is to add resposive elements for medium and small screens
